interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask | Butt & Thigh Booty Mask | Lightweight Wash Off Type Butt Mask for Cellulite, Stretch Marks, Skin Detox, Ingrown Hairs | Skin Firming and Clearing Booty Mask Formula for Sensitive and All Skin Type | Formulated with Collagen, Rosemary Extract, Centella Asiatica, and Other Natural Ingredients | 100% Natural, Cruelty-free | 2.7 oz
Review Date: 2021/06/25
Store: PROOT
Product Description: ['Our skin nourishing Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask Mask is power packed with collagen and other natural ingredients. Its innovative and natural booty masking formula is infused with collagen and centella asiatica extracts to give your booty super supple and clear booty complexion.', 'Our skin nourishing Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask Mask is power packed with collagen and other natural ingredients. Its innovative and natural booty masking formula is infused with collagen and centella asiatica extracts to give your booty super supple and clear booty complexion.', 'Our Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask works to gently detoxify and purify skin by drawing out impurities, oil and environmental toxins.', 'Our Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask works to gently detoxify and purify skin by drawing out impurities, oil and environmental toxins.', 'Free of synthetic color additives, fragrance and stabilizers, our booty mask is packed with natural and innovative formula that helps reduce fine lines and cellulite, replenish moisture levels and relieve dryness.', 'Free of synthetic color additives, fragrance and stabilizers, our booty mask is packed with natural and innovative formula that helps reduce fine lines and cellulite, replenish moisture levels and relieve dryness.', 'Suitable for all skin types.', 'Suitable for all skin types.', 'No paraben, No silicones, No animal tests, No artificial color', 'No paraben, No silicones, No animal tests, No artificial color', 'Dermatologist tested, Gentle on sensitive skin.', 'Dermatologist tested, Gentle on sensitive skin.', '2.7 fl.oz', '2.7 fl.oz', 'Directions: On clean & dry skin, apply a thing layer to your booty for 15-20 minutes. After masking, please wipe the mask with a towel or wash off in a shower. Use 2-3x per week.', 'Directions', ': On clean & dry skin, apply a thing layer to your booty for 15-20 minutes. After masking, please wipe the mask with a towel or wash off in a shower. Use 2-3x per week.', 'Ingredients: Water, Kaolin, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Beeswax, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Polysorbate 60, Bentonite, Vinyl Dimethicone, Polyglutamic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Glycyrrhiza Uralensis (Licorice) Root Extract,Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Carbomer, Arginine, Fast Acid Magenta, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Allantoin, Panthenol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Fragrance, Disodium EDTA', 'Ingredients', ': Water, Kaolin, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Beeswax, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Polysorbate 60, Bentonite, Vinyl Dimethicone, Polyglutamic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Glycyrrhiza Uralensis (Licorice) Root Extract,Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Carbomer, Arginine, Fast Acid Magenta, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Allantoin, Panthenol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Fragrance, Disodium EDTA']
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'PROOT', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Butt Mask', 'Scent': 'Rosemary', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Sensitive, Dry, Normal', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.4 x 6 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Choice Cosmetics Co.,Ltd'}
Review Text: This clarifying mask makes your skin feel smoother, but as far as clearing acne on your inner thighs or lightening dark spots it doesn't help at all. I've been using it regularly for 2 week now with no improvement. It does make your skin feel soft and smooth so maybe better used for smoothing the buttocks.
Review Title: Doesn't help clear inner thigh acne or lighten dark spots as I was expecting!
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Gel Nail Polish Set, Holiday Red Black 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Anzuo {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 3.7 x 3.3 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FZ', 'UPC': '738626208554'} I should have read the description on this set better, before ordering as they do not come with a base or top coat which is necessary to get the best longevity out of gel polish.

However I did order the base and top coat from this same brand on Amazon and it works really well. I love the colors in this set and it seems to last about 12-14 days as long as you prep your nails like you should for gel polish.

The color swatch stickers are also nice so you can paint them cure them and apply them to the tops of the bottles and you know which color is which without opening each bottle! Good quality gel polish, but wish it included the base and top coat! Soo'AE Sweet Pink Bubble Mask, Clarifying & Softening, 1 Count SOOAE {'Brand': 'SOOAE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Softer', 'Scent': 'Peach', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 0.1 x 5.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} I got this as a stocking stuffer for my daughter, I will update the review once she uses it if we see any irritation or issues with it. She loves these mask so I'm always trying to find some different ones we haven't tried before. Great stocking stuffer! Womens’ Metallic Finish Non Slip Grip 48 Counts 2 Inches Hair Bobby Pins Gray DARONGFENG {'Brand': 'DARONGFENG', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Gray', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal, Rubber', 'Package Dimensions': '4.61 x 2.52 x 0.35 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '788465401296'} Good quality bobby pins that hold really well. I haven't seen the gray color in stores so it was really nice that you could order this color on Amazon. Great bobby pins, Love that you can get them in the gray color! Facial Cleansing Brush made with Ultra Hygienic Soft Silicone 4-PACK HAMUULL {'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 1.97 x 0.08 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '779683799654', 'Manufacturer': 'HAMUULL'} I love these silicone face scrubbers, they exfoliate the skin so well and are easy to clean. Just place a dab of your favorite facial cleanser on the scrubber and go to work. It helps with creating a rich lather and exfoliating all of the skin. Great for exfoliating the skin! Gel Nail Polish Set, Glitter 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Anzuo {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.15 x 3.54 inches; 10.23 Ounces'} These gel polish shimmer colors are beautiful and perfect on their own with two coats or over top of a base color coat. They cure easily with a UV light and are chip resistant for almost 2 weeks.

Very durable polish and great selection of colors in this set! Great gel polish, perfect shimmer colors to go over a base color coat! Empty Amber Glass Spray Bottles - (4 Pack) 16 oz with Labels Refillable Container for Essential Oils, Cleaning Solutions, Cleaning Products, Hair, Plant Mister, Daily Shower, Gardening or Aromatherapy AYL {'Brand': 'AYL', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 7.6 x 7.17 inches; 2.98 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'EmptyAmberGlassSprayBottles 4 Pack', 'UPC': '860005177202'} I have been slowly switching my cleaning products over to more environmentally friendly and wanted to start investing in glass spray bottles and soap dispensers as well. These are just beautiful, the perfect size and came packaged very well to keep the glass from breaking in transit.

These are just as esthetically pleasing as they are practical and I will be purchasing more in the future. I loved the personal touch of the note inside from the seller as I always love to support small businesses. These spray bottles are great if you are in the market do not hesitate to purchase them. Beautiful Amber Glass Spray Bottles! Dip Powder Nail Starter Kit 8 Colors Acrylic Dipping Powder System for French Nail Manicure Nail Art Set, Portable Kit for Trave, No LED Nail Lamp Needed… Colorfairy {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Colorfairy', 'Included Components': 'Dip Powder, Nail Lamp', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Package Dimensions': '5.98 x 4.17 x 2.72 inches; 9.77 Ounces'} Overall this kit worked well, but I will say use the directions shown here online and not the ones on the back of the packaging that this kit comes in. On the instructions posted here it goes over which steps need to be repeated and give more detail.

This stuff is super strong once it is on and my daughter still hasn't been able to remove all of it completely. We are going to have to look up the best removal method for dip powder, but the top coat does dry quickly and is very smooth and shiny.

Looking at the polish you can almost see the granulated powders. It still leaves a pretty finish, but the glitter appears to be more professional looking since you cannot really see that it is a powder underneath the top coat. Worked well, but finish is a little different than your normal polish! GERSHION Pastel Gel Nail Polish Set, 6 Colors Gel Polish Set, Soak Off UV Lamp Gel Polish Kit, Nude Pink Yellow Green Color Nail Polish Kit, 7.5ml Gel Polish Kit H-10 GERSHION {'Brand': 'GERSHION', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Blue,Green,Pastel,Pink,Purple', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Special Feature': 'Long-lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.5 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '4.53 x 3.27 x 3.15 inches; 9.74 Ounces'} I love these spring colors in this assortment of gel polishes! They are super pretty shades and these worked well with my other gel base and top coats. It cured perfectly and has lasted well without chipping/peeling. Worked great with my other gel base and top coats! Purple Shampoo and Conditioner Set - Sulfate Free Salon Grade (2 x 16.9 fl oz) - Hydrating Toner - Shimmer Correction for Platinum Blonde, Silver, Light, and Grey Hair - New Formula BELLISSO {'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Shine,Restoring,Nourishing', 'Brand': 'BELLISSO', 'Hair Type': 'Color', 'Scent': 'Green Tea,Natural', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '8.86 x 6.02 x 3.11 inches; 2.91 Pounds', 'UPC': '765066671129'} My daughter has a natural dirty blonde hair color with some blonde balayage mixed in and this purple shampoo and conditioner really helps to keep her blonde from appearing brassy/yellow. Great for twice a week use and maintenance of her color. Love that it is sulfate free and these bottles are large enough that they will last her quite some time. Great quality purple shampoo & conditioner for my daughter's naturally blonde hair with highlights! profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** The user strongly prefers gel nail products, skincare tools, and has developed an interest in body masks, particularly those offering skin firming and detox benefits. Their ongoing interest in dip powder nail kits, pastel gel polishes, and vibrant, eco-friendly hair care products remains prominent.

- **Quality Focus:** They prioritize high-quality, durable, non-toxic, and cruelty-free beauty items, seeking functionality and modern, sustainable designs that align with their values.

- **Purchase Behavior:** The user's recent acquisition of a body mask reflects their commitment to maintaining a well-rounded beauty routine, focusing on eco-conscious choices including refillable containers and sustainable products across beauty and body care.

- **Color Aesthetic:** They appreciate vibrant and pastel color palettes in beauty products and accessories, favoring shimmery finishes that align with their personal style while also considering effective formulations for body treatments.

- **DIY Enthusiasm:** The user showcases an enthusiasm for at-home beauty routines, actively engaging in nail care and skincare, now branching into body care with masks that prioritize skin health.

- **Packaging Preference:** They favor effective, eco-friendly packaging that minimizes environmental impact.

- **Review Engagement:** The user actively shares detailed feedback on their product experiences, promoting best practices in beauty routines and supporting small businesses in beauty and home goods. They approach new products thoughtfully while maintaining a practical focus on results and quality.
